name: 林含怡
objective: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
schedule:
Week 1: No class
Week 2: Introduction to the Essay
Week 3: The Example Essay I
Week 4: The Example Essay II 
Week 5: The Comparison and Contrast Essay I
Week 6: No class
Week 7: The Comparison and Contrast Essay II
Week 8: The Classification Essay I
Week 9: Midterm 
Week 10: The Classification Essay II
Week 11: The Process Analysis Essay I
Week 12: The Process Analysis Essay II
Week 13: The Cause-and -Effect Essay I
Week 14: The Cause-and -Effect Essay II
Week 15: The Argumentative Essay I
Week 16: The Argumentative Essay II
Week 17: No Class
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Attendance & participation 15%
Individual reports 20%
Assignments & class activities 25%
Two major papers 40%
materials: Smalley, R. L., Ruetten, M. K. & Kozyrev, J. R. (2012) Refining Composition Skills. Boston: National Geographic Learning.
